metadata.synopsis: An undercover officer (Jean-Claude Van Damme) investigates murder and mayhem in a prison where kickboxing comes in handy.

reviews: ...a palpable low point within Van Damme's spotty body of work.
If you like Jean-Claude's movies, this might be tolerable. If not, stay away ... stay far, far away!
Van Damme should have stuck to the martial-arts flicks
Also known as "The One with Van Damme in Jail."
